item.title: Compiling Errors
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

        client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];

Add that at the top of your method and then add a c. next to anything that has to be called out of client.java

item.title: Compiling Errors
item.dc:creator: @Runeblade912 Runeblade912
item.description:
@Runeblade912 wrote:

Mining Handler.Java

Varible Error (I THINK)
#1

[code]
import java.io.*;

public class MiningHandler

{
public void doMine(int doMineLevel,int doMineOre,int doMineXP,boolean doMineCarry,int doMineTime,int doMineSpawn,int doMineX,int doMineY,int doMineID) ;
{
if((doMineX - absX) <= 1 && (doMineY - absY) <= 1)
{
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273) {
{
if(playerLevel[14]>=doMineLevel)
{
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
skillX = doMineX;
skillY = doMineY;
oreType = doMineOre;
oreXP = doMineXP;
carryOver = doMineCarry;
pickaxe();
actionAmount++;
double tempTime = (double) Math.random() * pickType;
miningTimer = Math.max(doMineTime + pickType / 4 + (int) tempTime - (playerLevel[14] - doMineLevel), 3);
rockX[0] = doMineX;
rockY[0] = doMineY;
rockID[0] = doMineID;
rockSP[0] = doMineSpawn + (int) (doMineSpawn * (double) Math.random());
actionMining = true;
actionTimer = pickTime;
resetAnimation();
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to be at least level “+doMineLevel+” mining to mine this rock”);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a pickaxe to mine!”);
}
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

Errors:
Copying is a *****
Cant Copy… Hold

#2
Sytax Error (I THINK)

[code]import java.io.*;

public class MiningHandler

{
public void doMine(int doMineLevel,int doMineOre,int doMineXP,boolean doMineCarry,int doMineTime,int doMineSpawn,int doMineX,int doMineY,int doMineID) ;
{
if((doMineX - absX) <= 1 && (doMineY - absY) <= 1)
{
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273);
{
if(playerLevel[14]>=doMineLevel)
{
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
skillX = doMineX;
skillY = doMineY;
oreType = doMineOre;
oreXP = doMineXP;
carryOver = doMineCarry;
pickaxe();
actionAmount++;
double tempTime = (double) Math.random() * pickType;
miningTimer = Math.max(doMineTime + pickType / 4 + (int) tempTime - (playerLevel[14] - doMineLevel), 3);
rockX[0] = doMineX;
rockY[0] = doMineY;
rockID[0] = doMineID;
rockSP[0] = doMineSpawn + (int) (doMineSpawn * (double) Math.random());
actionMining = true;
actionTimer = pickTime;
resetAnimation();
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to be at least level “+doMineLevel+” mining to mine this rock”);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a pickaxe to mine!”);
}
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

MiningHandler.java:34: reached end of file while parsing
}
 ^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
